snippet: Royal Bank of Canada has agreed to buy the 50 percent stake in RBC Dexia Investor Services that it does not already own for 837.5 million euros, or $1.1 billion.
abstract: Royal Bank of Canada has agreed to buy the 50 percent stake in RBC Dexia Investor Services that it does not already own for 837.5 million euros, or $1.1 billion.

headline.main: Royal Bank of Canada Buys Out RBC Dexia
